Key: Ah...
It's so noisy for being this early... *grunt*!

(As I began to move, I suddenly remembered the
things that happened before this morning. It was
truly a horrible awakening.)
Oh... Arusu. What are you doing...?

I am doing jumping exercises on top of Shido
Itsuka's body.

Yes, I know that. I can feel your dance moves on
my stomach.
Yes. And how is it?
What do you mean how is it... AH!
Hahaha. You said, "AH!"
A-Are you acting like Kotori for some reason?
...Please forget what you've seen.
You... just... get off of me.
Yes. Understood. How was it...?
Uh, what do you mean by that?

...I heard that this is how you are regularly
awoken. So I attempted to replicate this method.

Ah... Kotori does it, so I guess it does happen
often enough...

I mean, yes it happens, but I don't want it to be
a regular thing.
...Was there a problem with my execution?

Oh, no, it's not your fault, Arusu. But you don't
have to do this... Rather, please don't.
Okay.
Phew... Her heel was just about to pierce in...
...Did I do it incorrectly?

Well, it is what Kotori does. But... yeah, it's
not right.
I... I'm sorry.
It's fine... Oof...
(...Arusu was a little heavier than Kotori.)

I was going to get into a routine, but I seemed to
have failed. I apologize...

Replicating Kotori's wake-up call shouldn't be a
benchmark of success. So don't worry about it.
Okay... Understood.

So, this is finally Day 2, huh?
Man, not over yet...

Correct. I still do not know what love is. I wish
to know love.
Well, let's take our time.

Yes. I've obtained some new information. I'm
thinking of collecting feedback on it.
Feedback...?
Hey! Shido, are you not going to get up yet?!

Is breakfast not ready?! Arusu, if Shido won't
wake up, just elbow him in the crotch!
Kotori! What kind of orders are you giving her?!
He's already awake... Although, if I should...?

You don't have to! Rather, I'd prefer you not.
Don't do it, okay?!

According to my data, this can also be taken as
the set up". Should I follow Kotori Itsuka's

No! It's not! I'm not setting you up for a bit!
I'm awake! I don't want it!

This certainly satisfies the conditions.
Understood.

...Phew. I'm glad you do... *sigh* Anyways, let's
go make breakfast.

(...Arusu's acting the same as usual. I wonder who
that aggressive Arusu was last night at Takadai
Park.)

(Though, from what I saw, she did seem the same as
usual. Come to think of it, I don't exactly know
much about Arusu to begin with.)

(She's a... program? She doesn't look that way.
Maybe she's some kind of autonomous artificial
intelligence. A sentient AI.)
Arusu, do you want to eat anything?
Eat anything...? I have no particular need.

I see. I guess I can make what I made yesterday.
Toast and eggs. Maybe scrambled this time. I froze
some rice too, so it doesn't have to be toast.

...If I can select a preference,
I would like toast.

Hm? Come to think of it, you got seconds
yesterday, didn't you? You like toast?
Like... Maybe that's it. I would like to try it\nagain.

Then maybe I can do grilled cheese or pizza toast.
I have some tomato sauce.
They are both intriguing.

Hmm, then let's do the pizza toast. There'll
be cheese on it anyways.
Okay. Then... please make me that.
Sure. Hm...?
Please, Shido Itsuka. Is something the matter?
Oh, nothing. I think I was just imagining things.
Is that so?

(For a second, I felt like something was off,
but... I wonder what it is... Oh well.)
